title: Electricity: a first film
creator_credit: BFA Educational Media and Norman Bean Films
brief_description: Shows how electricity works, how it is generated, and the ways in which it can be utilised. Also demonstrates principles involved in making electromagnets, and safety precautions with electricity. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
